item.title: Beauty Is Good For You
item.description:
Intent I want to pursue the reader that pursuing beauty is good for him or her.

  • Beauty helps you become morally upright
  • Beauty can transform human behaviour
  • Broken window theory

Beauty is considered by many as the reserve of the privileged but we are all attracted to it just as moths are to light. The pursuit of beauty can be transformative and its contemplation is enlightenting. Beauty is good for you.
